p: For DD analysis, 10 μL of absolute (100% v/ v) TTO were inoculated onto individual 6-mm filter paper discs and placed on Mueller Hinton Agar (MHA) plates containing ~1.5 × 10 8 CFU/mL of the tested bacteria whereas for VP, TTO-impregnated (concentration as above) discs were placed on the lid of the petri dish and covered with parafilm, as previously described [ 51] so that only the TTO vapor fraction was responsible for organism inhibition.
